content.rendered:
RAISING THE BENCHMARK FOR APARTMENT LIVING IN THE MIDRAND AREA

Crowthorne Luxury Apartments is an exclusive rental development located in Whisken Avenue, Midrand. The development consists of spacious units, ranging from 1-bed to 3-bed units that are spacious and easy to furnish. Unit interiors have feature face-brick walls. The estate consists of a walking trail and trim track with outdoor gym equipment along the way. There is a tennis court, braai area, mini soccer field and numerous children’s play areas. Free weekly activities include hip-hop dancing, tennis coaching, free gym training sessions and monthly outdoor movies. The estate layout allows for maximum amount of space around the apartment blocks, increasing the common area sizes.
Contact Byron
Contact Ayanda
BROCHURE
ESTATE RULES
MEET THE NEIGHBOURS
ESTATE LOCATION

ESTATE FEATURES

Bachelor, 1-bed, 2-bed and 3-bed apartments to rent
Sizes range from 42m² – 108m²
Rent from R7,200pm – R14,200pm
Modern open plan layouts with quality finishes
Tight security with biometric fingerprint access
Best value for money lifestyle in the Midrand/Kyalami area
Close proximity to retail centres
Free internet in each apartment
Care-free living as maintenance is included
Free weekly activities and social events for kids and adults

OUTDOOR FACILITIES

Walking Trails/Paths
Children’s Play Parks
Braai Facilities
Tennis Court – FREE Weekly Classes
Mini Soccer Field
Swimming Pool
Outdoor Gym with Trim Track

INDOOR FACILITIES

Multipurpose Clubhouse
Compact Gym
(FREE Weekly Classes)

TAKE A LOOK AT SOME OF OUR LAYOUTS BELOW

CROWTHORNE LUXURY IS ON SHOW 7 DAYS A WEEK FROM 9:00 UNTIL 17:00
